overview:
Julian is responsible for brand development, marketing and PR for Qorus Software. Julian is experienced in marketing enterprise software and technology solutions internationally - having worked in the US, Germany and South Africa marketing to UK, US, German, Scandinavian, South African and Australian businesses. Julian has done marketing for Software AG, Kaplan IT Learning, and Dimension Data, among other companies. During the past 15 years, he has marketed enterprise systems, e-learning software, e-commerce, CRM, and now document automation and SharePoint.

Julian is fluent in English, German and Spanish. Proficient in French. Basic Italian and Danish. Julian is a native of Atlanta and holds a BA in Business Administration from Georgia State University.

For more details, please visit http://www.linkedin.com/in/julian247
